subject: Football (College)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Blake Sims, thriving under the guidance of Kiffin, the new offensive coordinator, had 445 passing yards as the No. 3 Crimson Tide routed the Gators.
snippet: Blake Sims, thriving under the guidance of Kiffin, the new offensive coordinator, had 445 passing yards as the No. 3 Crimson Tide routed the Gators.
